Reference

Wrapper function

nosoiSim()

Top-level function to use Nosoi

Specific functions

These functions are called by nosoiSim and are specific to the type of simulations your run.

singleContinuous()

Single-host with structured (continuous) host population

singleDiscrete()

Single-host with structured (discrete) host population

singleNone()

Single-host without structured host population

dualContinuous()

Dual-host with structured (discrete) host population

dualDiscrete()

Dual-host with structured (discrete) host population

dualNone()

Dual-host without structured host population

Output functions

These functions are used to get information on your nosoi output.

nosoiSummary()

Summary of a simulation

numberInfected()

Number of Active infected units at time t

getTransmissionTree()

Get full transmission tree

sampleTransmissionTree()

Sample the transmission tree

sampleTransmissionTreeFromExiting()

Sample the transmission tree among the exited hosts

Contents

  • Wrapper function
  • Specific functions
  • Output functions
